title: Acoustic - Volume 2
description: 15 Acoustic music themes ideal for nature, family, home and life contents.
longDescription:
Preview the collection:

  • YouTube


Acoustic - Volume 2 features 15 acoustic music themes ideal for nature, family, home and life contents. The arrangements include premium tenor ukulele, acoustic guitars, piano, mandolin, upright bass and many types of percussions. Every music theme comes with multiple loops and shorter edits for further editing.

Total amount of 1,04Gb of music. 


  • Beautiful Life Full length (02:07), 8 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Beautiful Nature Full length (01:29), 6 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Big Family Full length (02:11), 9 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Bumblebees Full length (01:17), 5 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • By Heart Full length (01:26), 6 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Country Dreams Full length (01:43), 10 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Days With You Full length (02:08), 11 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Early Morning Sun Full length (02:00), 8 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Green Grass Full length (02:01), 10 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Hawaiian Dream Full length (01:42), 9 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Life Is Yellow Full length (02:08), 9 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Lights From Paradise Full length (02:00), 8 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Precious Garden Full length (01:48), 10 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Through The Outskirts Full length (02:12), 8 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Tiny House At The Lake Full length (01:49), 9 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Maybe you might be interested at Acoustic - Volume 1 or Hawai'i - Vol.1

This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 15 Full length
  • 45 Short edits
  • 126 Loops
  • 30 Intro&Outro


Number of Audio Wavs: 216

Number of Audio Cues: 216

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 1h 51m 08s

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
